titleStmt.title: An antidote against the infection of the Jacobites, occasioned by last papers of Sir John Friend, Sir William Parkins, Mr. Cranburne &c. who pretend to die in the communion of the Church of England. By a minister fo the Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J.D. for Jonathan Robinson at the Golden Lion in St. Paul' Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
